RainbruRPG::Server::ServerLog

RainbruRPG::Server::ServerLog Class Reference

#include <serverlog.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

A widgets showing the log output.

This class is not a peplacement for RainbruRPG::Exception::Logger. This widget can print messages directly to the server screen (a client connection...). It is not a debugging tool, it is end-user provided.

It is based on a QTreeWidget, with these columns :

  • Time : The time of the insertion of the message
  • Level : The level of the message (Information, Warning, Error)
  • Message : The message

Definition at line 95 of file serverlog.cpp.

void RainbruRPG::Server::ServerLog::clearLog (  )  [private, slot]

Clears the content of the log.

It simply calls tree->clear() but it is a convenience to add a dialog in the future, for example to keep only error message or so on.
